DOC.brief_summary: -Does Honan balloon reduce intraocular pressure preoperatively?
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Honan Balloon in Intraocular Pressure Reduction Before Phacoemulsification
DOC.detailed_description: -Does Honan balloon improve surgeon's satisfaction and patients' pain score when compared to no honan group?
DOC.criteria: cataract patient,who plan to undergo phacoemulsification no previous ocular surgery one eye high myopia Use ASA or anticoagulants History of glaucoma or ocular hypertension uncooperative patients
